text:
Howdy Folks!
I recently added the SMS addon to our HubSpot, and I'm trying to trigger SMS messages via the API - is this possible?

I have a livestreaming website, and users want to subscribe to SMS alerts when a show starts. I have a serverless function that triggers whenever a show starts, but I'm trying to learn how to trigger the SMS when that function fire.
I tried using the webhook-driven workflow, but when I send a `fetch` to the address I was given I get a 415 unspported media type error.

Has anyone done something like this? TIA!

Hola Everyone!
I am looking to deploy an app in marketplace which I would like to integrate in my workflows. But I am unaware of the fact that how can I list my app in this 'Integrated App' section in HubSpot. Can someone provide some tips or resources for this task.
Is anyone else completely unable to save CCAs right now? Every time I make a single change, even if it is literally adding a space, I get this message:
